entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 09:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -36.6°C
Wind: NNE 34 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 36. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
